alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Richmond (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 16 at 7:40PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Columbia, northwestern Burke and central Richmond Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 739 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hephzibah, or 11 miles northwest of Waynesboro, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grovetown, Evans, Fort Gordon, Martinez, Hephzibah, Harlem, South Augusta, Augusta Mall, Village Plaza Shopping Center, Blythe, Keysville, Liberty Park Community Center, Glenn Hills, Bath-Edie, Westmont, Bellevue Memorial Gardens, Forest Hills, Leitner Lake Conference Center, Pea Patch Aerodrome and Ellwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in Georgia between mile markers 191 and 198. Interstate 520 in Georgia between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
